name: SubmitInterviewFeedback
description:
Submit interviewer's rating and comments for an interview.

This tool is used to submit details about an interview, including the interviewer's rating and comments, for processing in the Workday system. It is secured by the Interview Feedback Public API and operates within the Recruiting scope.

parameters.name: workday_resource_id
parameters.description: The unique Workday ID of the interview resource to submit feedback for.

value_schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

parameters.name: interview_feedback_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing details of the interview, including the interviewer's rating and comments.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Workday API

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

value_schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
